channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Dame Vera Lynn at the BBC
channel.desc: The BBC celebrates the Forces' Sweetheart with a look back through the archives at some of her favourite performances and biggest hits.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Dame Vera Lynn
channel.desc: A birthday tribute celebrating the life and work of Dame Vera Lynn, including exclusive access to Dame Vera as she watches home movies and videos from the past with her daughter.
